isis.stitle: TSI 06-12-24 - Flat Pulley and Belt Kit to Eliminate Belt Squeal

subjectgroup.subject: Flat Pulley and Belt Kit to Eliminate Belt Squeal

note.para: This information is not applicable to the International® installed air conditioner compressor belt arrangement.

geninfo.para: A flat pulley kit and drive belt kit are released to eliminate belt squeal. When installing the Pulley Kit, 1875756C91, the Belt Kit, 1875757C91, must be used.
